amendment.description: To authorize the temporary refusal of admission into the customs territory of the United States of consumer products manufactured by companies that have violated consumer product safety rules.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4132 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4132 proposed by Senator Brown. (consideration: CR S1679-1682; text: CR S1679) To authorize the temporary refusal of admission into the customs territory of the United States of consumer products manufactured by companies that have violated consumer product safety rules.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4132 proposed by Senator Brown.
